en:
热闹
(Rènào)

lively

Definitions of 热闹
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

adjective
    lively
        热闹, 活泼, 轻快, 爽快, 明快的
    bustling with noise
        热闹

verb
    liven up
        热闹
    have a jolly time
        热闹
